entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:42 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
